org.GameLogic.DataStructures

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.GameLogic.DataStructures.Participant
      • org.GameLogic.DataStructures.Player

  • public class Player
extends Participant
    A class for a player that contains additionally the players score and tiles.
